memberdef.name: PARSE_NUMBER_N
memberdef.initializer: { int i = 0; while (i++ < n && it != end && Ascii::isDigit(*it)) var = var*10 + ((*it++) - '0'); }

memberdef.name: PARSE_FRACTIONAL_N
memberdef.initializer: { int i = 0; while (i < n && it != end && Ascii::isDigit(*it)) { var = var*10 + ((*it++) - '0'); i++; } while (i++ < n) var *= 10; }
